content.query:
SELECT
patient.gender AS Patient_Gender,
patient.maritalstatus_text AS Patient_Marital_Status,
SUM(claim.total_value) AS Sum_Of_Claim_Total_Value,
COUNT_BIG(claim.total_value) AS Count_of_Claims
FROM fhir.patient_main_hash AS patient
INNER  JOIN
(
SELECT
patient_id_reference
FROM fhir.observation_main
INNER JOIN fhir.observation_code
ON observation_main.observation_id = observation_code.observation_id
WHERE
observation_code.code_text='Pain severity - 0-10 verbal numeric rating [Score] - Reported'
AND observation_main.valuequantity_value IN (8,9,10)
GROUP BY patient_id_reference
) AS observation
ON patient.patient_id = observation.patient_id_reference
LEFT JOIN fhir.claim_main AS claim
ON patient.patient_id = claim.patient_id_reference
WHERE
claim_main.billableperiod_start_date >='01-01-2020 00:00:00' AND claim_main.billableperiod_start_date <'12-31-2021 00:00:00'
GROUP BY
patient.gender,
patient.maritalstatus_text
ORDER BY
patient.gender,
patient.maritalstatus_text
